name: Squirrel Woods
description:
Eat seeds and jump as high as possible!

Gather enough seeds to unlock nuts that then are scattered throughout the level. Jump on the nuts for powerups.
Climb the local scoreboard and compare scores with your friends.

Toskr is a small squirrel searching for food before the winter wake.
Dangerous creatures and obstacles try to hinder his ascension
and become more frequent the higher he gets. While his attempts may seem futile, his determination is unbreakable.
